name: Altiverse - the hunt for Shaculia
description:
Welcome to the altiverse.

 

My name is Oltazar, I am a great wizard of interdimensional transport.

During one of my many experiments, my most precious possession got lost in an alternate universe.

I am sending you into the altiverse, in two parallel dimensions, to find 'Shaculia'.

 

But I realize now that I got the manuals for your separate dimensions mixed up.

You must work together to solve the puzzles which you encounter on your journey.

 

First you must find the 9 missing pages of the manual which are scattered around the house. The directions listed in the manual, will not be of any help to you, but perhaps, they will be helpful for you partner.

If you ever wish to save your progress, press space, to create a little flag which marks your current progress and spawn-location.

Remember: teamwork makes the dream work.             

Return when you have found Shaculia.

Have a wonderful journey… through the altiverse!!
